## Analysis

### Statistical Considerations
- Multiple comparison problems
- Effect size estimation
- Power analysis in fMRI studies

### Methodological Challenges
- Head motion artifacts
- Physiological noise
- Scanner differences
- Analysis software variations

![Challenges in fMRI research](images/fmri-challenges.jpg)
:::

::: {.content-block}
## Conclusions

Based on current research:
- Reliability varies across different types of studies
- Larger sample sizes generally improve reliability
- Standardized protocols enhance reproducibility
- Pre-registration and data sharing are crucial

### Recommendations
- Use of standardized protocols
- Increased sample sizes
- Better reporting practices
- Open data sharing

![Future directions in fMRI research](images/fmri-future.jpg)
